clang++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX14.4.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/main.dir/core/src/Application.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/core/src/SceneParser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/core/src/ScriptEngine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/core/src/Window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/core/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/dep/tinyxml2/tinyxml2.cpp.o -o main  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.3.4.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/liblua5.4.dylib -framework OpenGL libglad.a
